name: Henchman Hospital
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2015:

Our dashing hero has just cut a bloody swathe through the dark lord's minions and is on his way to the fortress of DOOM. YOU, however, are a medical intern at one of the dark lord's many understaffed hospitals, in charge of tending to the wounded minions, and making sure they're fighting fit for their next encounter! Our tutorialisation leaves something to be desired, but have a look at the gameplay video for a basic overview of the mechanics!
